column3: great environment.  Had reservations (is a must) for 5 of us.  Still had to wait about 15-30 min.  It was cooler out but they had heaters outside that kept everyone toasty.  We had a few drinks and got seated.  The server was knowledgeable and helped us choose what to order.  Drank Sake and beer
column4: she timed everything perfect.  It is expensive
column5: but if you have the money to blow
column6: this is a great place to do it.  Great dining experience.  Sushi is a bit Americanized by how creative it is
column8: I have never been to Japan either.  All flavors in the sushi are soooooo good.  I am getting hungry writing this review.
